Tags with Superpowers: x-tag Use the contents of a field to label your tags. â€“ `caption` might be a good choice to start. (The field //title// is used if this is left empty.) !!! " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/x-tag/x-tag-picker": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/x-tag/x-tag-picker", "caption": "x-tag Editor tag picker", "created": "20190105140021052", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219154944377", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define x-tag-button() <$set name="field" filter="[{$:/plugins/telmiger/x-tag/settings##default-label}minlength[1]] ~[[title]]"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tag="a"> $(actions)$ <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/NewTagName"/> <$macrocall $name="x-tag-pill" tag=<>/> \end \define x-tag-picker(actions) <$set name="actions" value="""$actions$""">

{{$:/language/Search/Search/TooShort}}
""" variable="listItem"> <$list filter="[tags[]is[system]search:title{$:/temp/NewTagName}sort[]]" variable="tag"> <>
\end " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/x-tag/x-tag-pill": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/x-tag/x-tag-pill", "caption": "x-tag pill macro", "created": "20190104065441583", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219154944362", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define x-tag-pill-inner(tag,icon,colour,fallbackTarget,colourA,colourB,element-tag,element-attributes,actions) <$vars foregroundColor=<> backgroundColor="""$colour$"""> <$element-tag$ $element-attributes$ class="tc-tag-label tc-btn-invisible" style=<>> $actions$<$transclude tiddler="""$icon$"""/> <$view tiddler=<<__tag__>> field=$(field)$ format="plainwikified"><$view tiddler=<<__tag__>> field="title" format="text" /> \end \define x-tag-pill-body(tag,icon,colour,palette,element-tag,element-attributes,actions) <$macrocall $name="x-tag-pill-inner" tag=<<__tag__>> icon="""$icon$""" colour="""$colour$""" fallbackTarget={{$palette$##tag-background}} colourA={{$palette$##foreground}} colourB={{$palette$##background}} element-tag="""$element-tag$""" element-attributes="""$element-attributes$""" actions="""$actions$"""/> \end \define x-tag-pill(tag,element-tag:"span",element-attributes:"",actions:"") <$macrocall $name="x-tag-pill-body" tag=<<__tag__>> icon={{{ [<__tag__>get[icon]] }}} colour={{{ [<__tag__>get[color]] }}} palette={{$:/palette}} element-tag="""$element-tag$""" element-attributes="""$element-attributes$""" actions="""$actions$"""/> \end" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/x-tag/x-tag": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/x-tag/x-tag", "caption": "x-tag macro", "created": "20190104063037271", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219154944390", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define x-tag(tag,label:{{$:/plugins/telmiger/x-tag/settings##default-label}}) <$vars field=$label$> {{$tag$||$:/plugins/telmiger/x-tag/ui/TagTemplate}} \end " } } }
